userReviewList.body: Having got an earlier this year I set about finding some good games. I have deleted hundreds of games that either rely heavily on IAP or ones that became repetitive. This title however is not one of them. This game is simple to play yet very complex and lengthy in terms of its gameplay. The graphics and frame rate are silky smooth. It's just one of the most playable enjoyable games I've ever played. And I'm a fan of certain console zombie games (COD). Epic game, thank you.

userReviewList.body:
Much better than the first game, and has alot more variety.
My only problems with the game are -

1. Single use items are stupidly expensive - Why not make them a one time purchase, but you can only have one equipped at a time?

2. Giants are cheap - If you are back peddling from a horde and a reaper giant spawns behind you, thats pretty much game over. Very little chance to escape.

3. Shop is cluttered - Maybe split the shop into separate pages.

4. Cannot disable weapons once purchased - Maybe add an option to disable weapons untill you have upgraded them to a decent level.

Overall the game is very good. I look forward to seeing what comes over the next few updates.

Edit : two more annoyances -

5. It's too easy to destroy weapon crates with melee and explosives - considering the basic axe is useless, destroying crates is a bad idea. You have to stop swinging melee weapons when still 5 meters away, because 1-2 hits will destroy crates. And another time I was using a MG when a sheep spawned on me, auto equipped and insta fired, destroying the MG I had.

6. Previously saved levels are no longer saved - I beat most levels and they said "saved" in the shop, but now some of them have lost the Saved bit. I don't know what it means, or even if this is supposed to happen.
